questions.question: You are a data scientist working on a project that involves training a machine learning (ML) model to forecast customer demand. You and other members of your team need to re-train the model in Amazon SageMaker frequently as new data becomes available. Which method should you use to manage and track model versions?
options: Manage this model using local storage and share the model as needed.
Manage this model using Amazon SageMaker Model Registry in a Collection.
Manage this model using Amazon SageMaker Model Registry in a Model Group.
Manage this model using Amazon S3.
correct_answers: Manage this model using Amazon SageMaker Model Registry in a Model Group.
